summary.Title: Event Manager - Team Lead
summary.Presentation:
Do you believe that going to work every day should be fun? At Umbraco, we do.

We are looking for an Event Manager to head a team of 3 and to strengthen our efforts in our events.

Quali
summary.OccupationArea: Medie, kultur, turisme, idræt og underholdning

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you believe that going to work every day should be fun? At Umbraco, we do.

We are looking for an Event Manager to head a team of 3 and to strengthen our efforts in our events.

Qualifications

The most important qualification is your personality: who you are, what values and attitudes you have, and how you interact with and behave towards other people.

You have the right stuff if you:

  • Have a take charge and friendly personality
  • Feel comfortable with taking responsibility for your own and your team’s tasks
  • Are structured when it comes to task and team management
  • Thrive in a company where things move fast
  • Have a proven track record of making successful events both virtual and in person
  • See events as the foundation of good business opportunities
  • Have previous leadership roles - or are eager to step into leadership
  • Your communication skills in English - written and spoken - are at an advanced level.
The purpose of the role

The main purpose of the role is to ensure that events are incorporated as a key part of the overall strategy of Umbraco, supplementing community, sales and marketing efforts across our focus markets. Specifically the aim of the role is to:

  • Increase product adoption and brand awareness through growing our already successful events calendar further
  • Engage developer and partner community further in events thus extending Umbraco’s reach
  • Identify opportunities to get Umbraco in front of new relevant audiences, and subsequently plan and execute on events that grow awareness about Umbraco and attract new business opportunities.
Activities

Developer Community-related events:

  • Lead the strategic planning and execution of Umbraco’s annual Codegarden conference
  • Drive and/or support conferences/events and meet-ups in our four key markets (US,UK,NL and nordics) together with our developer and partner community
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders and developer community event organizers to build new events and grow current ones
  • Partner with the Umbraco development team to proactively take part in community meetups and festivals, in the role of speakers and/or attendees

Partner related events:

  • New Year’s Reception
  • Global Partner Summit
  • Tech partner event (New)
  • Dutch Partner Summit
  • DK Partner Summit, UK Partner Summit
  • US Partner Summit, SE Partner Summit
  • Monthly: Tech partner webinar and Case Study webinar

Other:

  • Cloud Club
  • Coding Class
  • Stakeholder reporting

You will be part of our communication and marketing unit (COMA) and report to the VP of Marketing, Martin Wülser Larsen.

Work from anywhere

We have a work from anywhere policy, however in this important role we expect you to be at our HQ in Odense several days per week.

How to apply

Hit apply below.
You will improve your chances significantly by reading about Umbraco on our different media platforms.
